name: cos550-fredthuo1
description: This is the start of your repository for the Advanced Software Engineering course. 1. Clone this repository to your computer. 2. Create a basic project of your chosen application type within a sub-folder of your clone. 3. Establish a proper .gitignore file for your project before making any commits into revision control. 4. Commit the starter files for the basic project. 5. Begin work on your project features.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
